author: coffeebank
install_msg: Thanks for installing, I hope you enjoy :) To stay up to date with breaking changes, you might want to join my Support Discord. To find documentation, Discord, and more, drop by the GitHub repo at https://github.com/coffeebank/coffee-cogs
name: wordledb
short: Save your Wordles, send a POST request to a MongoDB URI.
description: Save your Wordles, send a POST request to a MongoDB URI.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
